name: Tree Keeper
description:
#teamtrees

HELP US ACHIEVE THE GOAL OF PLANTING 20,000,000 TREES!

PLEASE DONATE! - https://teamtrees.org/

Story:

Tree bandit try to stop the tree progress! As a tree keeper, you have to protect the tree using your POWER.

Control is simple, only 3 buttons:

  • <LEFT>, <RIGHT> to move.
  • Move close to a bandit then <DOWN> to lift 'em.
  • Once you lifted a bandit, use those 3 buttons to THROW and KNOCK OUT the bandit in different direction!

Tips: You can throw a bandit to KNOCK OUT a bandit!!!

Credits:

  • All graphics are from Kenney.
  • Music and sound effects created using SunVox.

License for the package available to download below:

(CC0 1.0 Universal) You're free to use these game assets in any project, personal or commercial. There's no need to ask permission before using these. Giving attribution is not required, but is greatly appreciated!
